title: Business Strategy Practical Skills Enhancement: Mobile Microlearning Course for Integrated Pharmacy Education Improvement

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can analyze integrated theory-practice pharmaceutical cases to propose real-world application strategies.
Learners can achieve over 80% of learning objectives across five microlearning modules aligned with constructive alignment principles.
Learners can establish personalized learning plans and evaluate in-depth learning outcomes for three practical scenarios.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
